sentences.en: Don't sneak away and hide.
sentences.cn: 别溜走藏起来。

sentences.en: Greta Garbo went to great lengths to hide from reporters and photographers.
sentences.cn: 葛丽泰·嘉宝想方设法躲开记者和摄影师。

sentences.en: haven't seen hide nor hair of them since the argument.
sentences.cn: 自从那次争论后，我连他们的影子也没看到

sentences.en: He ducked his head to hide his admiration.
sentences.cn: 他低下头以掩饰他的仰慕之情。

sentences.en: He had pulled the blanket over his body to hide his nakedness.
sentences.cn: 他把毛毯扯过来裹住自己赤裸的身体。

sentences.en: His laugh-a-minute image is just a front to hide his deep unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 他滑稽可笑的形象只是用来掩饰内心深处痛苦的假面具。

sentences.en: I could find neither hide nor hair of him.
sentences.cn: 我怎么也找不到他。

sentences.en: Lee tried to hide his excitement.
sentences.cn: 李试图掩饰自己的激动心情。

sentences.en: ox hide gloves
sentences.cn: 牛皮手套

sentences.en: Quick, he’s coming! We’d better hide.
sentences.cn: 快，他来了! 我们最好躲起来。

sentences.en: Sam said, "I'm going to hide," and scooted up the stairs.
sentences.cn: 萨姆说：“我得藏起来”，然后匆匆上了楼。

sentences.en: She could not hide her amusement at the way he was dancing.
sentences.cn: 她见他跳舞的姿势，忍俊不禁。

sentences.en: She could not hide her dismay at the result.
sentences.cn: 她无法掩饰自己对这一结果的惶恐不安。

sentences.en: She fancied he was trying to hide a smile.
sentences.cn: 她猜想他正在尽力掩饰笑容。

sentences.en: She keeps a bottle of gin hidden behind a stack of books.
sentences.cn: 她在一堆书的后面藏了一瓶杜松子酒。

sentences.en: The gangsters hid out in a remote cabin until it was safe to return to the city.
sentences.cn: 暴徒们在一个偏僻的小屋中藏了起来，直到能够安全回城

sentences.en: Their mother was trying to hide her two blacked eyes.
sentences.cn: 他们的母亲想遮住自己被打青的双眼。

sentences.en: There was nowhere to hide and nowhere to run.
sentences.cn: 无处可藏，也无处可逃。

sentences.en: This served to hide the confusion and imprecision in their thinking.
sentences.cn: 这个被用来掩盖他们思想的混乱和不准确。

sentences.en: To hide my fright I asked a question.
sentences.cn: 为了掩饰自己的恐惧，我问了个问题。

sentences.en: You feel an animal panic to run and hide.
sentences.cn: 你会感到一种本能的恐惧而想要去逃避。
